review:
No issues with the doctor. However major issues with the staff.
This was my second visit to the hospital. I went to show my blood test report to Dr. Praveena Shenoy. When I visited for the first time back in March, the doctor had advised me to get these tests done and walk in without prior appointment as is the norm. I even called before visiting to ensure I didn't need an appointment and they confirmed the same. After I reached, I was told by the receptionist that I would need to pay for the visit since I didn't go back with the reports within a week's time since my first consultation. Now this was totally new for me as I wasn't informed of any such policy at the time of my first visit. After 45 minutes of waiting and speaking with multiple people, including the OP in charge, Ms./Dr. Tulika, I was told I would need to pay even though it was a miss on the hospital's side to apprise me of this policy. Totally disgruntled and frustrated I had no other option but to pay since I didn't want to spend time any further.A couple of fellow patients also expressed their irritation with the staff and the way they handled "customers" (I was shocked to hear the staff there addressing us as customers/clients). Their grim and stern faces added up to my misery. They weren't one bit apologetic about their blunder for which they made me go through all of this.
Had it not been for Dr. Shenoy, I would have never ever visited cloud nine again. I would not recommended anyone to visit this branch ever just because of the staff.

Surgical and Post delivery experience-  She has got real magic in her hands. No matter if its a normal delivery or major c section surgery, recovery is super quick under her supervision. Her caring touch, neat stitches, fabulous guidance has made my post surgical experience so smooth which I never thought of. In my case normal delivery was not favorable but C section delivery is no longer seems to be scary any more in her presence !!! Great doctor indeed !!!

Is that what doctors are for? To leave your patient when she needed you.

review:
Dr. Shenoi is simply amazing. When I started going to her, I wondered if she'll have enough time and attention for me given she is the busiest gynae in the town and shuttles through three rooms in one go. But I was pleasantly surprised. She gives you complete attention, is warm and friendly and prompt over emails as well. Another thing I liked is that she covers all her bases and informs well in advance of all the tests to be done (Liver tests for ICP + Hb in my case) and precautions to be taken (crowded places during viral season in Blr).
She gave me her best effort for a normal delivery and when it failed, didn't let me feel miserable to end up with a csec. Post delivery also, she came in everyday for checkup. She has a very rich experience and it shows!

Would absolutely recommend her for pregnant moms!
